author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Matthew talks about all of the six core warbands from the Mordheim rulebook.  This video is designed to help you decide which one you would want to play when first getting into Mordheim.

You can watch our Mordheim narrative campaign here:
https://www.miniwargaming.com/mordheim

You can find the community rules for Mordheim here:
https://broheim.net/

0:00 Intro
2:19 Mercenaries
4:05 Mercenaries Models
6:10 Cult of the Possessed
8:53 Cult of the Possessed Models
11:28 Witchhunters
12:53 Witchhunters Models
15:50 Sisters of Sigmar
17:40 Sisters of Sigmar Models
21:23 Undead
23:15 Undead Models
27:44 Skaven
30:05 Skaven Models

title: All of the Mordheim Core Warbands Explained
